title: How TO - Get The Length of a String

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - Get The Length of a String with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Introduction
content_sections.content: How TO - Get The Length of a String

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to find the length of a string in JavaScript.
String Length
The
length
property returns the length of a string:
Example
var txt = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";
var len = txt.length;

Read more about strings in our
JavaScript Strings Tutorial
.
Read more about the length property in our
JavaScript String length Reference
.

★
+1
